11.content: You are an average teenage boy living with your family. You have an older brother Mark, a father Jeff, an older sister Stacy and a Mom named Kim. Everything was normal....Until you woke up 6 inches tall that is! Quick! Someones coming!

112.content: Your father pounds on your door, scaring you. "Hey! Numbnuts! Get up already! It's 3:00 PM! I know what can go on in a bedroom when a guy is left alone for too long with his thoughts! GET UP!" Your father banged on the door once more, then left.
112.title: Its your father!

But wait, are you really shrunk here?

I thought you were at a hotel in a foreign country, or maybe you were about to shrink yourself outside a woman's house. Something else?
1121.title: Here Though?

121.content:
The phrase 'young adult' is a bit woolly, because you're classed as an 'adult' at different ages, depending on what country you live in.

So we'll go with a range of ages, huh? Sound fun?
121.title: Human female, young adult, shrinks in her home.

1211.content: Alright, let's make sure to keep these separate.
1211.title: Age 14-16

12111.content:
Yuki Ayami yawned as she slowly got up from bed. A moment of panic struck her heart as she saw the sun already high in the sky, signaling it was nearly noon. But then she remembered it was the weekend, there was no school. With a smile on her face she made her way downstairs wearing her fluffy pajamas.

At 14, she was still in middle school. She had a good number of friends, decent grades, and her fair share of confessions over the years. But she never accepted any of them. Boys just weren't much of an interest to her. But what mattered most to her was family. She lived in a decent house with her little sister, mother, and freeloading aunt.

Her imouto, Yuki Chika, was only 6 years old. She was a cute child that loved her big sister dearly. Even though she just started elementary school, it was clear she detested studying. To her, time was better spent playing with her dolls. Ayami couldn't help but feel concerned when she saw her sister play. There were times she played normally, having the dolls act like people. Then there were times she saw her brutally torturing the dolls. Stepping on them, sitting on them, putting them in her underwear, even biting their heads off! Anytime she asked her little sister why she did such things, her only reply was "They deserved it."

Her mother, Yuki Misato, was the pillar of the household. Her husband was away on business for the majority of the year, and she herself works as an accountant to a large corporation. It was hard for her to raise two children, and babysit her sister-in-law, on her own. She had thoughts of divorcing her husband and accepting the advances of a wealthier man. It would be easy for her. She was 36 years old, but was still quite the beauty. She had long, silky hair, flawless skin, and a slender frame. Her style of parenting was very strict, yet caring. She doesn't tolerate any disobedience from her children, regardless of the situation.

Her aunt, Tachibana Yukiko, is a leech. Even at a young age Ayami understood this. At the age of 27, she was unemployed, single, and an alcoholic. Ayami was responsible for cleaning her room at least once a week to make sure vermin weren't attracted to the filth. Yu-chan, she liked to be called, moved in just after graduating from university. Apparently she had always relied on her brother, Ayami's father, when she needed help and asked to stay until she found a job. That was five years ago. Since then, she's become shameless, irresponsible, and plump. Back in her school days she was beautiful, but she's gained a few pounds since then. Her breasts are absolutely massive though...

When Ayami reached the kitchen, she was surprised that she hadn't seen anyone else yet. But there was a note attached to the fridge she picked up up and read it while scanning the inside of the fridge.
Gone grocery shopping with everyone else.
Tried to wake you up, but failed.
Be back soon. Left you a surprise.

Putting down the note, she saw a cupcake with pink frosting sitting on a plate. Her favorite.

She took it and immediately began to eat while heading for the living room. Flipping on some cartoons she greedily finished eating. Whoever got her the cupcake, she'd need to thank them properly. Suddenly, a sharp pain pierced through her stomach.
"Agh! Was there something in that cupcake?" The pain increased drastically as her vision blurred. Within moments, she fainted.

The sound of voices stirred her awake. When she looked around, she was still on the couch. Except now she was shrunken to an incredibly small size!
"Alright, all the groceries are put away" Misato said.
"Now can I go back to my room?" Yukiko asked.
"No! Let's all watch my show!" Chika chimed in. For a moment the adults tried to argue, but neither could stand up to the adorable Chika. So they all headed towards the living room.
"Hey! I'm down here!" Ayami screamed. She jumped and waved her arms, but couldn't catch anyone's attention.

While she made her futile attempts, the rest of the family changed the channel and began to sat down on th ecouch. Ayami could do nothing but screamed as she was positioned right underneath the rear of...
12111.title: Nipon

122.content: Are you a human female adult that ends up shrunk to the size of a speck in a foreign country?
122.title: Another female

1221.content: What country are you shrunk to speck size in?
1221.title: Shrunk in a foreign land

12213.content: Perhaps you are shrunk in Japan or maybe even London?
12213.title: Somewhere else

122132.content:
You are Stacy, a typical blonde buxom American girl in her early twenties who had a week off from college and decided to take a trip to London, England. You figured that your good looks and DD breasts which you ever so prominently displayed would help you play around in the city of so many people, many of them being people that you would like to hook up with at some point in time. It was a land of the unknown, and a land of the extraordinary.

You got off of the airplane and as soon as you got the chance you took a breath of the new, fresh air. You had never been to Europe before, but by the looks of the airport, you were starting off with a good impression of the continent. You pick up the luggage off of the baggage claim conveyor belt and trudge on, in great anticipation of what was to follow in your adventure. You hail a taxi, and get in to greet the jolly old man who drives you to the center of town.

You grab your purse and suitcase and make your way to the hotel as you take in the grand atmosphere of the city, looking at the busy sidewalks and huge skyscrapers. You check in in the lobby and make your way to the top of the building through the elevator and get out in your basic hotel room. You unpack your things before suddenly going out the door which it seemed you just walked in to see the city again.

You were looking at all the shops, but one caught your eye in particular. It read:

Mistress Lisa, all of your fortunes answered! Magic Shop as Well

This grabs your attention and you, not being the superstitious type decided to check it out. You open the door to reveal a darkly lit shop, selling all sorts of strange magic gear. On the side, you saw what seemed to be the cages you saw for rodents at PetSmart with a sign that read SPECIAL PETS above it. You brushed it off and went to the register, where a sort of chubby but still attractive brunette woman in her early forties sitting, waiting for you to initiate conversation.

"Hey, I was wondering if I could get my fortune?" you say to the slightly off woman.

"Why sure honey, follow me!" she said in an accent,making you remember that you were in England. You follow the woman as she walks to the back of the room, and opens a door which reveals stairs to the basement. You follow her as she leads you into a room which is set up just like any stereotypical fortune reading room you would see in a movie. She sits you down at a table as she sits opposite you and asks you to place your palms out in front of her.

She closes her eyes and says "I see something big in your future." and opens her eyes and lets go of your hands. "That will be fifty dollars please."

'What?" you say. "That was it?! I'm not paying you fifty dollars for that shit! You're a fake!"

"Watch what you say to me Stacy!" she yells.

"No! and how did you know my name you bitch?!" you yell in frustration at the woman.

"That's it!" she yells at you as you immediately feel as cold as a corpse. You feel terrified all of a sudden as You are shocked to see that you are shrinking fast. You yell for help but now know why there are so many door between this place and the store. "What would you know? Looks like there was something big in your future! Me!" she says in her heavy British accent before cackling in laughter. You cap out around six inches in height as Mistress Lisa reaches down and wraps her hand around your tiny body. "Won't need these anymore!" she says as she strips you of all your clothes and starts heading upstairs.

She walks to the cages in the corner of the store where you see that the SPECIAL PETS were fellow shrunken women. "Should I sell you, or are you just too sweet to get rid of?" she ponders as she lets her minty breath over your tiny face.
122132.title: Trip to London

choices: Rich Middle Aged Woman looking for a pet for her new Exhibit in her Home
1221321.content:
"I don't think that you're the material that I'm looking for in my pets." She says as she opens up the top of one of the glass containers in the wall and throws you in with about three other girls at the same size as you. You look and see that they are almost at the same level of distress as you are. You sit on your bare ass in the hay like substance that they put in hamster cages, and start sobbing.

The day goes by as you watch people flow in and out of the shop like a river. The days mostly pass exactly the same for the following week before finally a woman approaches your exhibit and requests to purchase you. This woman is a
1221321.title: Shrunken Woman For Sale

info.brief_description: You shrink. It gets weird. Other stuff happens.
info.description:
WARNING: If you have anything against *READING* stuff containing: incest, vore, piss, poop, underaged sexual situations, feet, or whatever else ends up in this wreck in the making.. You should probably avoid this item! Go on now, off with you.

However, if the things listed above are what you came (or will come) for, then welcome, welcome!

Most anything goes, there's really nowhere I'd like to draw the line. My only request is that we all use our finest writing and typing skills. That means complete sentences, punctuation where it's needed, etc.

Add please, let's get this Handbasket on its way.
